title: Krawummel
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, German
description: Vegan food restaurant in MÃ¼nster, opened May 2013. No table service: it's wait in line and take your plate. Has coffee, free Wi-Fi, plenty of seating. Offers healthier food with items such as avocado roll, falafel salad and sandwich, seasonal vegetable soups, salads with warm toppings, chili sin carne, cakes. Its website has a section listing alternative ingredients for people with specific allergies.
